summary: This is a quick script mod, that removes stamina usage when aiming with bows/crossbows when using T3nd0s Skyrim Redone.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52529-1-1396984599.png[/img][/center]
[line]

This mod removes stamina usage on bows and crossbows when using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/]T3nd0s Skyrim Redone[/url].

if you're using version 1.0, please uninstall it, by downloading the restore file
and unzip it into your data folder.

the mod should now work fully as intended, version 1.0 didn't work all the time.


[b][size=2]Dependency: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/]T3nd0s Skyrim Redone[/url][/size][/b]


[b][size=2]Optional:[/size][/b] Crossbows version; that only applies to crossbows.


[b][size=2]Install[/size][/b]
Unzip the "Skyre - Marksman Patch (Both/CrossBow).zip" file into your data folder.

[b]Load Order[/b]

SkyRe_Main.esp
[Other Skyre esps]
SkyRe_Survivalism.esp
*Skyre - Marksman Patch (Both/CrossBow).esp
*Place this mod after all Skyre esps.


[b][size=2]Uninstall[/size][/b]
Remove this file from your data folder:
Skyre - Marksman Patch (Both).esp
OR
Skyre - Marksman Patch (CrossBow).esp

[line]

[center]
